entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
